verses.verse: It is <S%G3654>actually<s%> <S%G191>reported<s%> that there is <S%G4202>immorality<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, and <S%G4202>immorality<s%> of <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G5108>kind<s%> as does not exist <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> that <S%G5100>someone<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> his father's <S%G1135>wife.<s%>

And you have become <S%G5448>arrogant,<s%> and have not <S%G3996>mourned<s%> <S%G3123>instead,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that the one who had <S%G4238>done<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2041>deed<s%> might be <S%G142>removed<s%> from your <S%G3319>midst.<s%>

For I, on my <S%G1473>part,<s%> <S%G3303>though<s%> <S%G548>absent<s%> in <S%G4983>body<s%> but <S%G3918>present<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> have <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G2919>judged<s%> him who has <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2716>committed<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> as <S%G5613>though<s%> I were <S%G3918>present.<s%>

In the <S%G3686>name<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> when you are <S%G4863>assembled,<s%> and I with you in <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> with the <S%G1411>power<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>

[I have decided] to <S%G3860>deliver<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G5108>one<s%> to <S%G4567>Satan<s%> for the <S%G3639>destruction<s%> of his <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> that his <S%G4151>spirit<s%> may be <S%G4982>saved<s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

Your <S%G2745>boasting<s%> is not <S%G2570>good.<s%> Do you not <S%G3609>know<s%> that a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G2219>leaven<s%> <S%G2220>leavens<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G5445>lump<s%> [of dough]?

<S%G1571>Clean<s%> out the <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G2219>leaven,<s%> that you may be a <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G5445>lump,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as you are [in fact] <S%G106>unleavened.<s%> For <S%G5547>Christ<s%> our <S%G3957>Passover<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> has been <S%G2380>sacrificed.<s%>

Let us <S%G5620>therefore<s%> <S%G1858>celebrate<s%> the <S%G1858>feast,<s%> not with <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G2219>leaven,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> with the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of <S%G2549>malice<s%> and <S%G4189>wickedness,<s%> but with the <S%G106>unleavened<s%> bread of <S%G1505>sincerity<s%> and <S%G225>truth.<s%>
I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> you in my <S%G1992>letter<s%> not to <S%G4874>associate<s%> with <S%G4205>immoral<s%> <S%G4205>people;<s%>

I [did] not at <S%G3843>all<s%> [mean] with the <S%G4205>immoral<s%> <S%G4205>people<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> with the <S%G4123>covetous<s%> and <S%G727>swindlers,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> with <S%G1496>idolaters;<s%> for <S%G686>then<s%> you would <S%G3784>have<s%> to <S%G1831>go<s%> out of the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

But <S%G3568>actually,<s%> I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> to you not to <S%G4874>associate<s%> with <S%G5100>any<s%> so-called <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he should be an <S%G4205>immoral<s%> <S%G4205>person,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4123>covetous,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> an <S%G1496>idolater,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G3060>reviler,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G3183>drunkard,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> a <S%G727>swindler<s%> â€“ not <S%G3366>even<s%> to <S%G4906>eat<s%> with <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G5108>one.<s%>

For <S%G5101>what<s%> have I to do with <S%G2919>judging<s%> <S%G3588>outsiders<s%> <S%G1854><s%>? Do you not <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> are <S%G2080>within<s%> [the church]?
